testcaseName: Patient is 4 months of age and has been administered a dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when an infant at age 4 months has been administered a first dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 (CVX 219) vaccine that the dose is considered to be valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
